issue.title: Grey banner message ad on gayxtapes.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gay.xtapes.to/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>So I don’t know if this is an ad but I think it is on gayxtapes.com 2. 

all I know is it’s some sort of message banner and this is not a cosmetic block like my element thing

it’s annoying and it’s not just something aesthetically I don’t want it’s distracting and is in the way 
3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/209810325-1a74bc49-fe35-450c-b24d-28ead8d16b8d.png


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Please check this rule:
> `||st.chatango.com^$third-party`

You want me to add that rule correct?

comment.body:
> Hello I can't reproduce this ad with the app for android and the extension. And this site has too little traffic. (23k visitors/month, >100000k needed)

You mean, this website has a low traffic volume, which means that it is a minority, and will not deal with this website. Small websites need advertising to make money, so the team will not process this request. Am I understanding correctly?Ok, I've seen this question was closed, thanks for your reply, sorry for seeing it now
